John Sealy Hospital.label: John Sealy Hospital
John Sealy Hospital.description: John Sealy Hospital is a hospital that is a part of the University of Texas Medical Branch complex in Galveston, Texas, United States. Wikipedia

Hadassah Medical Center.label: Hadassah Medical Center
Hadassah Medical Center.description: Hadassah Medical Center is a medical organization that operates two university hospitals at Ein Kerem and Mount Scopus in Jerusalem, Israel, as well as schools of medicine, dentistry, nursing, and ... Wikipedia

Hospital Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona.label: Hospital Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
Hospital Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona.description: Hospital Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona is a teaching hospital specializing in the fields of pediatrics, gynecology and obstetrics. It is located on Passeig Sant Joan de Déu in Esplugues de Llobregat, a municipality bordering Barcelona, Catalonia. Wikipedia
Hospital Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona.Address: Passeig de Sant Joan de Déu, 2, 08950 Esplugues de Llobregat, Barcelona, Barcelona, Spain

Nahariya Hospital for the Western Galile.label: Nahariya Hospital for the Western Galilee
Nahariya Hospital for the Western Galile.description: The Western Galilee Hospital is a hospital located in the coastal city of Nahariya and is the second largest hospital in northern Israel. It was established in 1956. Wikipedia

Hôtel-Dieu de Paris.label: Hôtel-Dieu de Paris
Hôtel-Dieu de Paris.description: The Hôtel-Dieu de Paris is regarded as the oldest hospital in the city of Paris, France, and is the most central of the Assistance publique - hôpitaux de Paris hospitals. The hospital is linked to the Faculté de Médecine Paris-Descartes. Wikipedia

Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital.label: Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital
Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital.description: The Hôpital Necker – Enfants Malades is a French teaching hospital, located in Paris, France. It is a hospital of the Assistance publique - Hôpitaux de Paris group, and is affiliated to the University of Paris Descartes. Wikipedia

Philippine General Hospital.label: Philippine General Hospital
Philippine General Hospital.description: The Philippine General Hospital is a tertiary state-owned hospital administered and operated by the University of the Philippines Manila, the University of the Philippines System's Health Sciences Center. Wikipedia

Pitié-Salpêtrière Hospital.label: Pitié-Salpêtrière Hospital
Pitié-Salpêtrière Hospital.description: The Pitié-Salpêtrière Hospital is a celebrated teaching hospital in Paris. Part of the Assistance publique - Hôpitaux de Paris, it is one of Europe's largest hospitals. Wikipedia

Sahlgrenska University Hospital.label: Sahlgrenska University Hospital
Sahlgrenska University Hospital.description: The Sahlgrenska University Hospital is a system of hospitals associated with the Sahlgrenska Academy at the University of Gothenburg, Gothenburg, Sweden. Wikipedia

Ullevål University Hospital.label: Ullevål University Hospital
Ullevål University Hospital.description: Ullevaal University Hospital in Oslo, Norway was opened in 1887. From January 1, 2009, the hospital is one of the four main campuses of the Oslo University Hospital. Wikipedia

Forsyth Medical Center.label: Forsyth Medical Center
Forsyth Medical Center.description: Novant Health Forsyth Medical Center is a 921-bed, not-for-profit, regional medical center in Winston-Salem, North Carolina, that offers a full range of medical, surgical, rehabilitative and behavioral health services. Wikipedia

Bangkok Christian Hospital.label: Bangkok Christian Hospital
Bangkok Christian Hospital.description: The Bangkok Christian Hospital is one of the oldest general hospitals in Bangkok, Thailand. Situated on Silom Road, Bangrak District. Wikipedia

St. Luke's Hospital (New Bedford, Massac.label: St. Luke's Hospital
St. Luke's Hospital (New Bedford, Massac.description: St. Luke's Hospital is a Massachusetts hospital located at 101 Page Street in New Bedford, Massachusetts. Wikipedia

Akershus University Hospital.label: Akershus University Hospital
Akershus University Hospital.description: The Akershus University Hospital is a Norwegian public university hospital located in the Lørenskog municipality, in the county of Akershus, east of the Norwegian capital Oslo. Wikipedia

Cirque Lodge.label: Cirque Lodge
Cirque Lodge.description: Cirque Lodge is a for-profit addiction facility located in Orem, Utah founded in 1999 by Richard Losee. In 2002, Cirque Lodge opened a second facility in Orem, Utah in a former television studio. Wikipedia

Bangkok Hospital.label: Bangkok Hospital
Bangkok Hospital.description: Bangkok Hospital is a hospital located in Bangkok, Thailand. It was opened in 1972 by a team of doctors, pharmacists and 30 nurses. Wikipedia

Auburn Hospital.label: Auburn Hospital
Auburn Hospital.description: Auburn Hospital is a 155-bed hospital in Auburn, which is in the western suburbs of Sydney, Australia. Wikipedia

Beaumont Hospital, Dublin.label: Beaumont Hospital, Dublin
Beaumont Hospital, Dublin.description: Beaumont Hospital, is a public voluntary hospital located in Beaumont, Dublin, Ireland. It is the second largest hospital in the Republic of Ireland. Wikipedia

Bedford Hospital.label: Gilbert Hitchcock House Bedford Hospital North Wing

St Thomas' Hospital.label: St Thomas' Hospital
St Thomas' Hospital.description: St Thomas' Hospital is a large NHS teaching hospital in Central London. Administratively part of the Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust, together with Guy's Hospital and King's College Hospital ... Wikipedia

Bellevue Hospital Center.label: Bellevue Hospital Center
Bellevue Hospital Center.description: Bellevue Hospital Center, most often referred to as "Bellevue", was founded on March 31, 1736 and is the oldest public hospital in the United States. Wikipedia

Berufsgenossenschaftliche Kliniken Bergm.label: Berufsgenossenschaftliche Kliniken Bergmannstrost Halle
Berufsgenossenschaftliche Kliniken Bergm.description: The Berufsgenossenschaftliche Kliniken Bergmannstrost Halle is the teaching hospital facility of University of Halle-Wittenberg, located in Halle, Saxony-Anhalt. Wikipedia

Boston Children's Hospital.label: Boston Children's Hospital
Boston Children's Hospital.description: Boston Children's Hospital is a 395-licensed-bed children's hospital in the Longwood Medical and Academic Area of Boston, Massachusetts. Wikipedia

Changi General Hospital.label: Changi General Hospital
Changi General Hospital.description: Changi General Hospital is a 790-bed hospital located in Simei, eastern Singapore. It is Singapore's first purpose-built general hospital to serve communities in the east and north-east regions. Wikipedia

Centre hospitalier de l'Université de Mo.label: Centre hospitalier de l'Université de Montréal
Centre hospitalier de l'Université de Mo.description: The Centre hospitalier de l'Université de Montréal is one of two major healthcare networks in the city of Montreal, Quebec. It is a teaching institution affiliated with the French-language Université de Montréal. Wikipedia

Children's Hospital Colorado.label: Children's Hospital of Denver
Children's Hospital Colorado.description: Children’s Hospital Colorado is a nonprofit hospital for children located on the Anschutz Medical Campus near the interchange of I-225 and Colfax Avenue in Aurora. Wikipedia

Cooper University Hospital.label: Cooper University Hospital
Cooper University Hospital.description: Cooper University Hospital is a provider of health services, medical education, and clinical research in southern New Jersey and the Delaware Valley, in the United States. Wikipedia

Doncaster Royal Infirmary.label: Doncaster Royal Infirmary
Doncaster Royal Infirmary.description: Doncaster Royal Infirmary is a district general hospital of 800 beds, located in Doncaster, South Yorkshire, England. Each year the hospital treats around 150,000 patients along with 95,500 A&E patients. Wikipedia

Evelina Children's Hospital.label: Evelina London Children's Hospital
Evelina Children's Hospital.description: Evelina London Children's Hospital is a specialist NHS hospital in London. It is administratively a part of Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust and provides teaching hospital facilities for King's College London School of Medicine. Wikipedia

El Camino Hospital.label: El Camino Hospital
El Camino Hospital.description:
El Camino Hospital is a 395-bed hospital based in Mountain View, California.
Located on a 41-acre campus in the heart of Silicon Valley, El Camino Hospital serves residents in the El Camino Hospital ... Wikipedia

Fairview Training Center.label: Fairview Training Center
Fairview Training Center.description: The Fairview Training Center was a state-run facility for people with developmental disabilities in Salem, Oregon, United States. Fairview was established in 1907 as the State Institution for the Feeble-Minded. Wikipedia

Gold Coast Hospital.label: Gold Coast Hospital
Gold Coast Hospital.description: Gold Coast Hospital, located on the Gold Coast, Queensland was a major teaching and referral hospital and the third largest in Queensland. The Gold Coast Hospital had one of the busiest emergency departments in the state. Wikipedia

Greifswald University Hospital.label: Greifswald University Hospital
Greifswald University Hospital.description: Greifswald University Hospital in Greifswald, Germany is a teaching hospital for the University of Greifswald's medical school. Wikipedia

Health Sciences North.label: Health Sciences North
Health Sciences North.description: Health Sciences North is a hospital located on 41 Ramsey Lake Road in the city of Sudbury, Ontario, Canada. It is the only trauma centre in Northern Ontario and Manitoba. Wikipedia

Guy's Hospital.label: St Thomas' Hospital
Guy's Hospital.description: St Thomas' Hospital is a large NHS teaching hospital in Central London. Administratively part of the Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust, together with Guy's Hospital and King's College Hospital ... Wikipedia

Hornsby Ku-ring-gai Hospital.label: Hornsby Ku-ring-gai Hospital
Hornsby Ku-ring-gai Hospital.description: Hornsby Ku-ring-gai Hospital is a hospital in Sydney, Australia, located on Palmerston Road in Hornsby. It is a teaching hospital of the University of Sydney. Wikipedia

Hospital Santo Tomas.label: Hospital Santo Tomas
Hospital Santo Tomas.description: Hospital Santo Tomás, is the largest Public hospital that the Panamanian Health Ministry has. Its long history goes as far as 1703. Wikipedia

Hospital for Sick Children.label: The Hospital for Sick Children
Hospital for Sick Children.description: The Hospital for Sick Children, also known as SickKids Hospital, is a major paediatric centre for the Greater Toronto Area, serving patients up to age 18. Wikipedia

Huntsman Cancer Institute.label: Huntsman Cancer Institute
Huntsman Cancer Institute.description: Huntsman Cancer Institute is an NCI-designated cancer research facility and hospital located on the campus of the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, Utah. Wikipedia

Kelsey-Seybold Clinic.label: Kelsey-Seybold Clinic
Kelsey-Seybold Clinic.description: The Kelsey-Seybold Clinic is a large multi-specialty clinic system located in Greater Houston with its administrative headquarters in Shadow Creek Ranch, Pearland. Wikipedia

Knowle Hospital.label: Knowle Hospital
Knowle Hospital.description: The Hampshire County Lunatic Asylum, later Knowle Mental Hospital and Knowle Hospital, was a psychiatric hospital in the village of Knowle near the town of Fareham in Hampshire, southern England, opened in 1852 and closed in 1996. Wikipedia

Los Angeles County+USC Medical Center.label: LAC+USC Medical Center
Los Angeles County+USC Medical Center.description: Los Angeles County+USC Medical Center, also known as County/USC, by the abbreviation LAC+USC, or by the name Los Angeles County General, is a 600-bed public teaching hospital located on 1200 N State ... Wikipedia

Markham Stouffville Hospital.label: Markham Stouffville Hospital
Markham Stouffville Hospital.description: Markham Stouffville Hospital is an acute care and community hospital serving south-east York Region. The hospital is located on Ninth Line north of Highway 7 in east-end Markham, Ontario, immediately south of the town of Whitchurch–Stouffville. Wikipedia

Meyer Children's Hospital.label: Meyer Children's Hospital
Meyer Children's Hospital.description:
The Meyer Children Hospital is a pediatric hospital located in Florence, Italy.
The hospital is an official member of the European Network of Health Promoting Hospitals of the World Health Organization ... Wikipedia

Monklands Hospital.label: Monklands Hospital
Monklands Hospital.description: Monklands District General Hospital, is a district general hospital in Airdrie, North Lanarkshire, Scotland. Administered by NHS Lanarkshire, it serves a population of approximately 260,000 people of North and South Lanarkshire council areas. Wikipedia

Montfort Hospital.label: Montfort Hospital
Montfort Hospital.description: The Montfort Hospital is a francophone hospital in Ottawa, Canada offering bilingual medical care to patients in the National Capital Region. Wikipedia

Mount Sinai Hospital, Toronto.label: Mount Sinai Hospital, Toronto
Mount Sinai Hospital, Toronto.description: Mount Sinai Hospital is a hospital in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Although it is physically linked by bridges and tunnels to three University Health Network hospitals, Mount Sinai is an independently operated facility. Wikipedia

Musgrave Park Hospital.label: Musgrave Park Hospital
Musgrave Park Hospital.description: Musgrave Park Hospital is a regional specialist hospital, managed by Belfast Health and Social Care Trust in Belfast, Northern Ireland. It specialises in orthopaedics, rheumatology, sports medicine and rehabilitation of patients of all ages. Wikipedia
Musgrave Park Hospital.type: Military hospital in Republic of Ireland

National Hospital for Neurology and Neur.label: National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery
National Hospital for Neurology and Neur.description: The National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery is a neurological hospital in London, United Kingdom and part of the University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust. Wikipedia

National University Hospital.label: National University Hospital
National University Hospital.description: The National University Hospital was established in 1985 and it serves as a tertiary hospital, clinical training centre and research centre for the medical and dental faculties of the National University of Singapore. Wikipedia

Northwick Park Hospital.label: Northwick Park Hospital
Northwick Park Hospital.description: Northwick Park Hospital is a large hospital in Greater London, England.It is located in the northwest corner of the London Borough of Brent, near the boundary with the London Borough of Harrow. Wikipedia

Monroe Carell Jr. Children's Hospital at.label: Monroe Carell Jr. Children's Hospital at Vanderbilt
Monroe Carell Jr. Children's Hospital at.description: The Monroe Carell Jr. Children's Hospital at Vanderbilt, also known as Vanderbilt Children's Hospital, is a children's hospital affiliated with Vanderbilt University Medical Center in Nashville, Tennessee. Wikipedia

Northwestern Memorial Hospital.label: Northwestern Memorial Hospital
Northwestern Memorial Hospital.description: Northwestern Memorial Hospital is a nationally-ranked academic medical center hospital located in downtown Chicago, Illinois. It is the primary teaching hospital for Northwestern University's Feinberg School of Medicine. Wikipedia
Awards: Telly Award for Non-Broadcast Productions Film/Video - Employee Communications

Perth Royal Infirmary.label: Perth Royal Infirmary
Perth Royal Infirmary.description: Perth Royal Infirmary is a district hospital in Perth. The Royal Infirmary, administered by NHS Tayside, caters for both the city and wider Perth & Kinross area, with a population around 182 000, being served by the hospital. Wikipedia

Prince of Wales Hospital, Sydney.label: Prince of Wales Hospital, Sydney
Prince of Wales Hospital, Sydney.description: The Prince of Wales Hospital is a major public teaching hospital located in Sydney's eastern suburb of Randwick, providing a full range of hospital services to the people of New South Wales, Australia. Wikipedia

Penn Presbyterian Medical Center.label: Penn Presbyterian Medical Center
Penn Presbyterian Medical Center.description: Penn Presbyterian Medical Center is a hospital located in the University City section of West Philadelphia. It is located between Market Street and Powelton Avenue, and N. 38 Street and N. Sloan Street. Wikipedia

Royal Alexandra Hospital for Children.label: Royal Alexandra Hospital for Children
Royal Alexandra Hospital for Children.description: The Royal Alexandra Hospital for Children is a children's hospital in Sydney, Australia. The Hospital was founded in 1880 as "The Sydney Hospital for Sick Children". Wikipedia

Queen Elizabeth Hospital Birmingham.label: Queen Elizabeth Hospital Birmingham
Queen Elizabeth Hospital Birmingham.description: The Queen Elizabeth Hospital Birmingham is an NHS hospital in the Edgbaston area of Birmingham, situated very close to the University of Birmingham. Wikipedia

Royal Columbian Hospital.label: Royal Columbian Hospital
Royal Columbian Hospital.description: The Royal Columbian Hospital is the oldest hospital in the Canadian province of British Columbia and one of the busiest in the Fraser Health Authority. Wikipedia

Royal Free Hospital.label: Royal Free Hospital
Royal Free Hospital.description:
The Royal Free Hospital is a major teaching hospital in Hampstead, London.
It was rated 'excellent' for quality of services and 'good' for quality of financial management by the Healthcare Commission in 2009. Wikipedia

Royal Melbourne Hospital.label: Royal Melbourne Hospital
Royal Melbourne Hospital.description: The Royal Melbourne Hospital, located in Parkville, Victoria an inner suburb of Melbourne is one of Australia’s leading public hospitals. It is a major teaching hospital for tertiary health care with a reputation in clinical research. Wikipedia

Sequoia Hospital.label: Sequoia Hospital
Sequoia Hospital.description: Sequoia Hospital is a hospital in Redwood City, California, USA. It is operated by Dignity Health. Wikipedia

St. Rose Dominican Hospital – Rose de Li.label: St. Rose Dominican Hospital – Rose de Lima Campus
St. Rose Dominican Hospital – Rose de Li.description: St. Rose Dominican Hospitals - Rose de Lima Campus is a 220,000-square-foot, 145-bed hospital owned and operated by Dignity Health that is located in Henderson, Nevada. Wikipedia

Shady Grove Adventist Hospital.label: Shady Grove Adventist Hospital
Shady Grove Adventist Hospital.description: Shady Grove Adventist Hospital is a 313-licensed bed acute care facility located in Rockville, Maryland. Despite its name, it is not located in Shady Grove, Maryland. Wikipedia

Saint John's Health Center.label: Saint John's Health Center
Saint John's Health Center.description: Saint John's Health Center is a private not-for-profit, Roman Catholic hospital in Santa Monica, California, United States. The hospital was founded in 1942 by the Sisters of Charity of Leavenworth. Wikipedia

Saint Vincent's Catholic Medical Center.label: Saint Vincent's Catholic Medical Center
Saint Vincent's Catholic Medical Center.description: Saint Vincent Catholic Medical Centers was a healthcare system, anchored by its flagship hospital, St. Vincent's Hospital Manhattan, locally referred to as "St. Vincent's". Wikipedia

St George's Hospital.label: St George's Hospital
St George's Hospital.description: Founded in 1733, St George’s Hospital is one of the UK's largest teaching hospitals. It shares its main hospital site in Tooting in the London Borough of Wandsworth, with the St George's, University ... Wikipedia

St James's University Hospital.label: St James's University Hospital
St James's University Hospital.description: St. James's University Hospital is in Leeds, West Yorkshire, England and is popularly known as Jimmy's being one of the United Kingdom's most famous hospitals. Wikipedia

St Bartholomew's Hospital.label: St Bartholomew's Hospital
St Bartholomew's Hospital.description: St Bartholomew's Hospital, also known simply as Barts, or more formally as The Royal Hospital of St Bartholomew is a hospital in Smithfield in the City of London. Wikipedia

Sydney Hospital.label: Sydney Hospital
Sydney Hospital.description: Sydney Hospital is a major hospital in Sydney, Australia, located on Macquarie Street in the Sydney central business district. It is the oldest hospital in Australia, dating back to 1788, and has been at its current location since 1811. Wikipedia

Sydney Adventist Hospital.label: Sydney Adventist Hospital
Sydney Adventist Hospital.description: Sydney Adventist Hospital, commonly known as the San, is a large private hospital in Sydney, Australia, located on Fox Valley Road in Wahroonga. Wikipedia

Tan Tock Seng Hospital.label: Tan Tock Seng Hospital
Tan Tock Seng Hospital.description: The Tan Tock Seng Hospital is the third-largest hospital in Singapore after the Institute of Mental Health and Singapore General Hospital, but its accident and emergency department is the busiest in ... Wikipedia

The Ottawa Hospital.label: The Ottawa Hospital
The Ottawa Hospital.description: The Ottawa Hospital, or L'Hôpital d'Ottawa, is a non-profit, public university teaching hospital in Ottawa, Canada. The hospital is made up of the former Grace Hospital, Riverside Hospital, Ottawa General Hospital and Ottawa Civic Hospital. Wikipedia

Stoke Mandeville Hospital.label: Stoke Mandeville Hospital
Stoke Mandeville Hospital.description: Stoke Mandeville Hospital is a large National Health Service hospital in the District of Aylesbury Vale and the town of Aylesbury, near the village of Stoke Mandeville in Buckinghamshire. It is part of Buckinghamshire Healthcare NHS Trust. Wikipedia

Tengku Ampuan Rahimah Hospital.label: Hospital Besar Tengku Ampuan Rahimah
Tengku Ampuan Rahimah Hospital.description: The Tengku Ampuan Rahimah Hospital in Klang, also known as Klang General Hospital or Klang GH is a 864-bed government tertiary hospital located in the south of the royal town of Klang, Selangor, Malaysia. Wikipedia
Address: Hospital Tengku Ampuan Rahimah Persiaran Tengku Ampuan Rahimah

Toronto General Hospital.label: Toronto General Hospital
Toronto General Hospital.description: The Toronto General Hospital, is a part of the University Health Network, and a major teaching hospital in downtown Toronto, Ontario. Wikipedia

University College Hospital.label: University College Hospital
University College Hospital.description: University College Hospital is a teaching hospital located in London, United Kingdom. It is part of the University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust and is closely associated with University College London. Wikipedia

Toronto Western Hospital.label: Toronto Western HospitalToronto Western Hospital
Toronto Western Hospital.description:
The Toronto Western Hospital is located at the corner of Bathurst Street and Dundas Street West in Toronto, Canada. It is part of the University Health Network.
TWH has 256 beds, with 46,000 visits to its emergency department annually. Wikipedia

University Hospital Heidelberg.label: University Hospital Heidelberg
University Hospital Heidelberg.description: The university hospital of Heidelberg is one of the largest and most renowned medical centers in the Federal Republic of Germany. Wikipedia

University Medical Center of Southern Ne.label: University Medical Center of Southern Nevada
University Medical Center of Southern Ne.description: The University Medical Center of Southern Nevada, known locally as UMC, is a non-profit hospital in Las Vegas, Nevada. Wikipedia

University Medical Center (Tucson, Arizo.label: University Medical Center
University Medical Center (Tucson, Arizo.description: University of Arizona Medical Center formerly University Medical Center — Tucson, is a private, non-profit 487-bed acute-care hospital in Tucson, Arizona. UAMC has two units University Campus and South Campus. Wikipedia

Mid-Western Regional Hospital, Nenagh.label: Mid-Western Regional Hospital, Nenagh
Mid-Western Regional Hospital, Nenagh.description: The Mid-Western Regional Hospital, Nenagh is a public hospital located in Nenagh, County Tipperary, Ireland. Wikipedia

Vanderbilt University Medical Center.label: Vanderbilt University Medical Center
Vanderbilt University Medical Center.description: The Vanderbilt University Medical Center is a collection of several hospitals and clinics, as well as the schools of medicine and nursing associated with Vanderbilt University in Nashville, Tennessee. Wikipedia

Aradale Mental Hospital.label: Aradale Mental Hospital
Aradale Mental Hospital.description: Aradale Mental Hospital was an Australian psychiatric hospital, located in Ararat, a rural city in Victoria, Australia. Wikipedia

Mont Park Asylum.label: Mont Park Asylum
Mont Park Asylum.description: Mont Park Asylum was a psychiatric hospital located in Melbourne, Australia. It was closed in the late-1990s. Wikipedia

St. James's Hospital.label: St. James's Hospital
St. James's Hospital.description: St. James's Hospital, also known as SJH, is the largest university teaching hospital in Dublin, Ireland. Its academic partner is the University of Dublin. Wikipedia

Roswell Park Cancer Institute.label: Roswell Park Cancer Institute
Roswell Park Cancer Institute.description: Roswell Park Cancer Institute is a cancer research and treatment center located in Buffalo, New York, USA. Wikipedia
Founder: Telly Award for Non-Broadcast Productions Film/Video - Fund Raising

Fremantle Hospital.label: Fremantle Hospital
Fremantle Hospital.description: Fremantle Hospital is a 24 hour acute-care public teaching hospital situated in central Fremantle, Western Australia, south of Perth. Wikipedia

Royal Perth Hospital.label: Royal Perth Hospital
Royal Perth Hospital.description: Royal Perth Hospital is an 855-bed teaching hospital located on the northeastern edge of the CBD of Perth, Western Australia. Royal Perth Hospital also has specialised rehabilitation facilities at Shenton Park. Wikipedia

Hôpital Saint-Luc.label: Hôpital Saint-Luc
Hôpital Saint-Luc.description: Hôpital Saint-Luc is a hospital in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Its address is 1058 Saint Denis Street at the intersection of René Lévesque Boulevard in the borough of Ville-Marie. Wikipedia

Redland Hospital.label: Redland Hospital
Redland Hospital.description: Redland Hospital is a public hospital, located in Redland City, Queensland, Australia. Its address is Weippin Street, Cleveland, QLD 4163. The hospital provides emergency, general medical, surgical and obstetric services. Wikipedia

Aravind Eye Hospital.label: Aravind Eye Hospital
Aravind Eye Hospital.description: Aravind Eye Care Hospital is an ophthalmological hospital with several locations in India. It was founded by Dr. Govindappa Venkataswamy in 1976. Wikipedia

Instituto Oncologico Nacional.label: Instituto Oncologico Nacional
Instituto Oncologico Nacional.description: The National Oncologic Institute or ION is a specialized hospital for cancer treatment, located in Panama City, Panama. Wikipedia
